gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 125, Nets 120
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Luka Doncic's 49 points (14 in the 4th quarter, 4-4 3 pt. FG), 10 rebounds and seven assists, the Mavericks defeated the Nets, 125-120. Tim Hardaway Jr. added 19 points and four rebounds in the victory, while Cam Thomas tallied 30 points and seven rebounds for the Nets in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 2-0, while the Nets fall to 0-2.
